tool_description: Compares current resume skills against job requirements to identify gaps and prioritize skill development or emphasis areas.

current_skills.description: List of skills currently listed in resume

experience_level.description: Applicant experience level: entry, mid, senior, executive

error_messages: No current skills provided: Include at least one skill from your resume.
No required skills provided: Include at least one required skill from job posting.
Invalid experience level: Use one of [entry, mid, senior, executive].
Skills list too long: Limit current skills to 100 items and required skills to 50 items.
usage: Provide your current skills and job-required skills, optionally include preferred skills and experience level for more targeted gap analysis.

transferable_skills.description: Current skills that relate to job requirements

priority_additions.description: Highest priority skills to highlight or develop

gap_severity.description: Overall gap assessment: minimal, moderate, significant, major
